caption:
Follow @beautifulhotels for more incredible stays 🌎

From sunrise with giraffes to sunset with elephants, these six stays let you get wild without sacrificing comfort 🐾🌿🌍

🇳🇦 Voigtland Guesthouse, Windhoek, Namibia (@vagamazz): Sip coffee while giraffes stroll past your veranda just outside Windhoek. This boutique spot offers luxury with long-necked neighbors. 🦒☕ 

🇹🇿 Serval Wildlife Sanctuary, Serengeti, Tanzania (@servalwildlife): Nestled near the Serengeti, this eco-luxury haven lets you meet servals, caracals, and cheetahs up close, while supporting conservation. 💚 🐆

🇿🇦 Mhondoro Safari Lodge, Limpopo, South Africa (@wirth.a.trip): Set in Limpopo’s Welgevonden Reserve, enjoy a luxury safari and watch wildlife from an underground waterhole hide. 🦓

🇹🇭 Wild Cottages Elephant Sanctuary, Chiang Mai, Thailand (@skygoesplaces): Wake up in Chiang Mai to elephants roaming freely just outside your eco-cottage. Responsible tourism meets unforgettable views. 🐘🏕️ 

🇦🇺 Kittawa Lodge, Tasmania, Australia (@damselintransit): Completely off-grid and wildly scenic, spot wallabies and wombats from your private cliffside lodge on King Island. 🦘

🇵🇪 Mountain View Experience, Cusco, Peru (@jsalas_): Sleep in a dome above the Sacred Valley with alpacas outside your door and panoramic views of the Andes. 🦙🏔️ 

What animal would you be most excited to see? 🦁 🌍 🧡
